授業目的: The purpose of this course is to guide the students to conduct their research on a topic of their interest and to enable them to write their graduation thesis.
到達目標:
In general, students will be able to complete their thesis within the designated time. In particular, students will be able to:
a) identify the research problem and develop research questions;
b) perform a review of the relevant literature;
c) select an appropriate theoretical and methodological framework and practical research design for their proposed study;
d) collect and analyze the necessary data and communicate the findings in an appropriate manner.
授業方法:
The format of this course is face-to-face.
This class is a mixture of lectures, readings, discussions, and student presentations. Students need to read the assigned study materials and participate actively in the class discussions.
Lectures: Instructor will clarify the key concepts related with discussion.
Discussion: In consultation with the students, a particular topic will be assigned by the instructor for each session. The discussion materials will be provided accordingly.
Presentations: Students need to make presentations on their research.
